message:
Quick Start
Run your local blockchain:
> ganache-cli --secure -u 0 -u 1 -u 2 --deterministic
Initialize the ZeppelinOS project:
> zos init zepkit
Go to the client directory:
> cd client
Run the React app:
> npm run start
Continue in your browser!
More at https://github.com/zeppelinos/provable-zeppelin-kit

hooks.post-unpack: npm install && cd client && npm install
